title: I AM ATHLETE | Hitmaka's Transformation from Yung Berg
description:
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/c/IAMATHLETE?sub_confirmation=1
WATCH MORE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/c/IAMATHLETE

Rapper, Producer and Songwriter Hitmaka joins Brandon Marshall, Adam "Pacman" Jones, and LeSean "Shady" McCoy and D,J, Williams in episode 47 of I Am Athlete. Watch this episode as Hitmka shares his tranformation from Yung Berg to Hitmaka.

#hitmaka  #hiphop
